title.rendered: Cofresco Team visits Smile on Wheels project in Bengaluru

content.rendered: Mr Hans Van Gele (Chief Operating Officer), Mr Kai Dornbusch (Chief Marketing Officer), Mr Oliver Strelecki (Chief Executive Officer) and Mr Ashutosh Singh (Country Manager) from the Cofresco Team joined the Smile Foundation team on ground and interacted with the underserved communities of Bengaluru. More than 61,000 children and families have received free doorstep healthcare in the last 3 years through the Cofresco supported Smile on Wheels mobile healthcare project.

excerpt.rendered: Mr Hans Van Gele (Chief Operating Officer), Mr Kai Dornbusch (Chief Marketing Officer), Mr Oliver Strelecki (Chief Executive Officer) and Mr Ashutosh Singh (Country Manager) from the Cofresco Team joined […]
